data.text: @steph_fuller Thanks Steph - getting through. The smell/taste loss is indeed a kicker! X

@Natterslearning Oh no not you too! It’s everywhere. If you’ve not seen Encanto then do check it out. We know all the words to all the songs-having watched it about 2,346 times 😆 hope you’re feeling better soon x
@MaireadO I have heard ‘we don’t talk about Bruno’ so much I know it word for word plus Barney does an amazing Bruno ‘mischievous grin’ impression for his hood up on his hoodie 😂
@MaireadO We both have it too! I might treat myself to some Disney…
@MaireadO Oh dear.  Hope not too bad x
@MaireadO It could be worse, it could be Frozen...
@epuddick Only one of us got it at Christmas- time for the rest of us now! It’s rough but the music helps ☺️
@MaireadO Oh no, not more! Still, great film!
